Text:
function RIR_EP05_06()
    -- .起-5【1月第4週】「悪意の凶刃」
    SaveData.Title = "悪意の凶刃"

    -- //BG：繁華街（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    MSG([[ Three weeks have passed since it was decided I'd participate in the Princess Election. Before I knew it, the month was almost over. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Since the boys' division had the day off, Lira and I went shopping for the things we needed in the busy downtown area near the station. ]])

    MSG([[ We made posters, compiled materials, held orientations—there was a mountain of things to do every day. ]])

    MSG([[ It's been a while since we went out together like this. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1603.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 “It's been a while since our date; I really enjoyed it.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】通常
 “<r=ケー・アイ・ジー>K・I・G</r>” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1604.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “Sorry, I slipped into polite speech again. When I’m in Erika mode, I just can't get used to speaking casually.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】苦笑・汗
 “Well, we've both been busy lately, so we haven’t met without masks. On free days, I have to take modeling jobs, after all.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】悲しみ
 “I really want to go on a real date—go to arcades, karaoke with you, Minato-kun!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1605.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑・汗
 “I guess going to a stationery store doesn’t really feel like a date.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 “It’s just a shopping run.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1606.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “Exactly.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Today, on the way home from school, we just bought some additional writing supplies for our daily strategy meetings. Calling it a date was definitely stretching it. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1607.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 （Lira-san never shows how tired she is at school, but she really is stressed, isn’t she?） ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira’s recent achievements have been remarkable, so it’s no surprise. ]])

    MSG([[ Even today, thanks to Lira researching the history of the Princess Election, we could all share ideas about how I should appeal myself in the election. ]])

    MSG([[ At first, some “knights” opposed Lira acting like a leader, but they’re gone now. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone is impressed by Lira’s daily flow of new ideas, and their trust in her is growing. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira has become, both in name and reality, my “Chief Knight.” That’s why as someone who’s always relying on her, I feel full of guilt. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1608.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 （For Lira-san, who’s working so hard for me... I want to do something for her.） ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I thought for a bit and remembered the topic Lira mentioned this afternoon. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1609.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 “Oh, right. Lira-san, didn’t you say a new pasta restaurant opened around here?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】驚き
 “I did, so what?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1610.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 “I’ll take off my makeup and change clothes now, so want to go together? It’s off from school dismissal time right now, so there’s less chance of being seen by anyone.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 “That’s an absolutely awesome idea! Let’s go, let’s go! I’ve been wanting to try it so badly!” ]])

    MSG([[ Lira’s face lit up. She was more delighted than I expected, and that made me happy too. ]])

    MSG([[ Like Hermes-san bouncing lightly, Lira looked up the restaurant’s location. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】笑顔
 “Then I’ll change, so come with me to my place and wait in my room.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】苦笑・汗
 “Nah... that’d be rude to Akira, so I’ll pass. There’ll probably be a line, so I’ll go ahead and line up.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】ウインク
 “But on the condition that you come back looking like a boy. Got it? Today, you’re going on a date as Minato without worrying about who’s watching.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】苦笑
 “Yeah, got it. I’ll fix the makeup and clothes properly before going.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")


    MSG([[ Lira just gave me the location on RINE, then we parted ways. ]])

    MSG([[ Now, no time to waste. I have to quickly get home, undo my cross-dressing, and head to Lira. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ I started jogging toward home—just then. ]])
STOP_SE("SEa015.wav")
    -- //BU：素顔３号（マスク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_SM301ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【？？？？】通常
 “Wait.” ]])
    -- //３号

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ A strange man blocked my way, stopping me in my tracks. Wearing a black mask and looking clearly suspicious, I instinctively tensed up. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1611.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 “W-was there something you needed?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0090.wav")
    MSG([[
    【？？？？】通常
 “Not from me... not from me, anyway.” ]])
    -- //３号

    MSG([[ His pompous way of speaking annoyed me a bit. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m in a hurry, so what does he want? Looking closely, he seemed somewhat familiar— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1612.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 “Um, I’m in a hurry, so could you please move?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0091.wav")
    MSG([[
    【？？？？】通常
 “You’re hurrying in the wrong direction... it’s the opposite.” ]])
    -- //３号

    MSG([[ The man pointed behind me, toward where I just parted with Lira. Could he have been watching Lira and me? And why...? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1613.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 “What do you mean?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The man suppressed his voice and chuckled quietly. ]])

    MSG([[ The moment he spoke the next words, a chill ran down my spine. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【？？？？】通常
 “The Himegami family isn’t after you... they’re targeting Hoozuki Lira.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1614.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 “—What!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ After saying that, the man dashed into a side alley and disappeared. ]])

    MSG([[ I couldn’t have misheard. He definitely said, “The Himegami family is targeting Lira-san.” ]])

    MSG([[ Who was that man? What does the Himegami family intend to do? I want to chase after him and get answers, but there’s no time. ]])

    MSG([[ Right now, I have to get to Lira-san as quickly as possible! ]])

    MSG([[ I turned on my heel and sprinted toward the station where Lira had headed. ]])

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(800)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    -- //BG：駅前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030" , 500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    -- //effct：リラのBUを普段より小さめに表示

    MSG([[ I spotted Lira in the distance. ]])

    MSG([[ Thank goodness, she seemed safe. She was walking at a quiet intersection near the station. ]])

    MSG([[ What the man said might be a lie, but just in case, I’ll join her now and not leave her alone. ]])

    -- //SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
WAIT(800)

    -- //BU：リラ（通常）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07aa")
    -- //effct：リラのBUを普段より小さめに表示

    MSG([[ I dashed through the crowd and finally got close enough to call out to Lira—just then— ]])

    -- //SE：猛スピードの車の音
    PLAY_SE("SEb041.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

    MSG([[ I saw a car speeding toward Lira at full speed. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEb041.wav")

    MSG([[ Huh...? My thoughts froze. I quickly pushed away the worst thoughts that crossed my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ No way, that’s impossible. But the car wasn’t slowing down despite the red light, and it was about to cross the stop line. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira ahead didn’t seem to notice the threat coming toward her. No!! If this continues, Lira will— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1615.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 “Lira-san, watch out!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ミナト

    MSG([[ I called out, stepping out to shield her. ]])

    -- //effect：画面がひっくり返るような表現
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：白バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_SE("SEb047.wav")

    MSG([[ Thud. ]])

STOP_SE("SEb047.wav")
    MSG([[ At the dull thud, my vision suddenly whitened as if a dazzling light was shined in my eyes. ]])

    MSG([[ While hearing Lira’s voice from afar, as if about to cry, I felt relief. ]])

    MSG([[ Thank goodness, Lira seemed alright. I made it in time. ]])

    MSG([[ Thank goodness. Really, thank goodness. ]])

    MSG([[ As I exhaled, ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ my consciousness suddenly faded away. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_07")
end
